bibl.title: 'Never Had the Like Occurred': Egypt's View of its Past
bibl.note: 1 fig. n./bl. et 20 fig. coul. sur 2 pll.

À propos de l'identification de deux terres cuites "ethniques" de Memphis proposée par: William M. FLINDERS PETRIE, Memphis I = British School of Archaeology in Egypt. 14, 1908 (London, 1909) pp. 15-17 et pll. XXXV-XLIV; - The Palace of Apries (Memphis II)= British School of Archaeology in Egypt. 15, 1909 (London, 1909) pp. 16-17 et pll. XXXIII-XXXIV; - Meydum and Memphis (III) = British School of Archaeology in Egypt. 16, 1910 (London, 1910) p. 46 et pll. XLII-XLVI.
